name: BiggerPockets Business Podcast
what_you_do: The BiggerPockets Business Podcast provides insights and advice for entrepreneurs and business owners, focusing on strategies for starting, scaling, and selling businesses.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves entrepreneurs and business owners, offering them valuable knowledge and experiences from various successful individuals in the business world.
